title: Abdelkarim Nafti
text:
Abdelkarim Nafti () (born 3 August 1981 in <a href="Sfax">Sfax</a>) is a <a href="Tunisia">Tunisia</a>n <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player. He plays as an attacking midfielder or sometimes a winger . He can also plays as a striker.
He joined African giants <a href="Al-Merrikh">Al-Merrikh</a> in 2009. His first goal for El-Merreikh was against Hilal Kadougli when El-Merreikh won 2-4 in Kadougli.
In August 2013, he moved to Maltese side <a href="Valletta%20F.C.">Valletta F.C.</a> from <a href="Club%20Africain">Club Africain</a>.
Nafti also played for <a href="CS%20Sfaxien">CS Sfaxien</a> and <a href="Al%20Nassr%20FC">Al-Nasr</a> in <a href="Saudi%20Arabia">Saudi Arabia</a>.
In addition, he played for the <a href="Tunisia%20national%20football%20team">Tunisia national football team</a>.
